professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in RAC, ASM, Data Pump, and Golden Gate. Proven track record in managing large-scale databases (20TB+), ensuring high availability, load balancing, and scalability. Strong skills in PL/SQL, SQL, and C/C++.

key_responsibilities: Configured ASM Disk groups and migrated non-ASM databases to ASM.
Troubleshooting Database issues and maintaining both DDL and DML as required.
Worked with team to set up RAC and maintained a healthy RAC database.
Configured Oracle Data Guard and performed daily maintenance of databases.
Validated database backups to ensure recovery from any situation.
Maintained databases by applying CPU and PSU patches on 10g and 11g.
Conducted capacity planning and storage management for databases.
Worked with infrastructure team to create new databases.
Ensured high availability and load balancing for large-scale databases.
Used Golden Gate for real-time data integration and replication.
Optimized database performance using Oracle's tools and scripts.
Collaborated with application teams to resolve issues related to database connectivity.
Monitored and maintained database backups using Oracle tools.
Performed regular health checks and proactive problem-solving.
Configured and managed Oracle Data Pump for large-scale data movements.
Implemented and monitored Oracle Golden Gate for real-time data integration.
